title: Understanding: family and marriage
creator_credit: Granada International Productions, Elaine Grand and Pauline Shaw
brief_description: This film looks at responsibility within the family, communication between members of a family and married couples and the idea of divorce as it relates to different concepts of the ideal marriage.
creator_credit_for_label: Granada International Productions, Elaine Grand and Pauline Shaw
